languages.text: "Черствые слова окрашены в малиновый и пурпур... Но за яркими цветами никогда не удается скрыть глубинных оттенков скорби".

traits.locale_text: "Черствые слова окрашены в малиновый и пурпур... Но за яркими цветами никогда не удается скрыть глубинных оттенков скорби".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."
languages.original_text: "Черствые слова окрашены в малиновый и пурпур... Но за яркими цветами никогда не удается скрыть глубинных оттенков скорби".

traits.locale_text: "The dry words are painted crimson and purple. It is impossible, however, to mask the true colours of sorrow with some bright ones."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The dry words are painted crimson and purple. It is impossible, however, to mask the true colours of sorrow with some bright ones."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The dry words are painted crimson and purple. It is impossible, however, to mask the true colours of sorrow with some bright ones."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The dry words are painted crimson and purple. It is impossible, however, to mask the true colours of sorrow with some bright ones."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Sus ariscas palabras se escriben con carmesí y púrpura... Pero no se puede enmascarar el color del pesar profundo con otros más vivos».
languages.original_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."

traits.locale_text: «Las meras palabras se escriben con carmesí y púrpura. Pero no se pueden enmascarar los auténticos colores del pesar con otros más vivos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那些冷酷无情的言语被涂上了深红色和紫色……然而，那些鲜艳的虚饰却无法真正掩盖悲伤的本色。”
languages.original_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."

traits.locale_text: “这些干巴巴的言语被涂上深红色和紫色。然而，这些鲜艳的颜色仍无法掩盖它们悲伤的本色。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les mots durs se peignent de rouge et de violet. Il est toutefois impossible de masquer les véritables couleurs du chagrin par des tonalités vives. »
languages.original_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."

traits.locale_text: « Les mots durs se peignent de rouge et de violet. Il est toutefois impossible de masquer les véritables couleurs du chagrin par des tonalités vives. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「乾いた言葉は深紅と紫に塗られる。しかし、悲しみの真の色を明るい色で覆い隠すことは不可能よ」
languages.original_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."

traits.locale_text: 「乾いた言葉は深紅と紫に塗られる。しかし、悲しみの真の色を明るい色で覆い隠すことは不可能よ」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seine hartherzigen Worte sind in Purpur und Violett getüncht ... und doch können bunte Deckschichten die tiefen Farben der Trauer niemals völlig verbergen."
languages.original_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."

traits.locale_text: "Die trockenen Worte sind in Rot und Violett bemalt. Es ist aber unmöglich, die wahren Farben der Trauer durch bunte zu übertünchen."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vurdumduymaz sözleri, kızıl ve mora boyanmış. Ancak parıltılı yaldızlar bile kederin koyu renklerini asla tamamen gizleyemez."
languages.original_text: "His callous words are painted crimson and purple... and yet bright veneers can never truly mask the deep colours of sorrow."
